task_description: Facing the building to your South-West (approx. 207°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: The top of the building is not visible in the current view, so I need to tilt my camera up to see the entire structure before I can estimate its height.
I can now see the entire building from the ground to the roof, and by counting the 11 visible floors and estimating each floor to be about 3 meters high, I can calculate the total height.
